remark.p: member, National Security Council Operations Staff for Latin America, from 1971
Operations Staff for Latin America, National Security Council from 1971

Deputy Chief of Mission-Counselor, U.S. Embassy in Kingston, from July 1973 until August 1975; Chargé d’Affaires ad interim, U.S. Embassy in Kingston, from 1973 until 1974; Chief, Industrial and Strategic Materials Division, Office of International Commodities, Bureau of Economic and Business Affairs, Department of State, from August 1975

National War College until July 1973; Deputy Chief of Mission-Counselor, U.S. Embassy in Kingston, from July 1973 until August 1975; Chargé d’Affaires, U.S. Embassy in Kingston, from 1973 until 1974; Chief, Industrial and Strategic Materials Division, Office of International Commodities, Bureau of Economic and Business Affairs, Department of State, from August 1975
member, National Security Council Operations Staff for Latin America from 1971
